ğŸ§ª LOCAL TESTING:

The package works! Test it yourself:

   # Test basic functionality
   python test_simple.py

   # Test with environment variables
   export OPENAI_API_KEY="sk-..."
   export OPENAI_MODEL="gpt-3.5-turbo"
   
   python -c "
   from alm_core import AgentLanguageModel
   agent = AgentLanguageModel()
   print(f'Model: {agent.llm.model}')
   print(f'Provider: {agent.llm.provider}')
   "

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ¯ KEY FEATURES IMPLEMENTED:

âœ“ Flexible Model Selection
  â†’ Works with ANY OpenAI or Anthropic model
  â†’ Configure via environment variables or code
  â†’ Models: gpt-4, gpt-3.5-turbo, Claude, etc.

âœ“ Environment Variable Support
  â†’ OPENAI_API_KEY - Your API key
  â†’ OPENAI_MODEL - Model to use (default: gpt-4)
  â†’ ANTHROPIC_API_KEY - Anthropic key (optional)
  â†’ LLM_PROVIDER - Provider selection

âœ“ Complete ALM Architecture
  â†’ Constitutional Policy Engine
  â†’ Data Airlock (PII protection)
  â†’ BDI Controller
  â†’ Browser automation
  â†’ Deep research
  â†’ Execution visualization

   â†’ Choose tag: v0.1.0
   â†’ Title: ALM Core v0.1.0 - Initial Release
   â†’ Add description from README.md
   â†’ Click "Publish release"

ğŸš€ QUICK START COMMANDS:

git push origin v0.1.0
